SEARCH
Package Database

Class InMemoryDatabase

java.lang.Object
Database.InMemoryDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InMemoryDatabase extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an in-memory database storing accounts, branches, and employees.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • addBranch

      public boolean addBranch(Branch branch)
      Adds a branch to the database. Branches must not contain an existing branch with the same branchName as the new branch.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the branch is added successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeBranch

      public boolean removeBranch(String branchName)
      Removes a branch from the database.
      Parameters:
      branchName - The name of the branch to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the branch is removed successfully, false otherwise.
